result.title: Programming Challenges Lab
result.content:
Hello everyone! This is the official Codeforces group for the Programming Challenges Lab. Here you'll be able to find weekly contests with different tasks, including those that were discussed during class.

To be able to participate go to the "Contests" tab in the Group navigation menu and register to the available contest. After that you'll be able to submit your code to the provided tasks.

Good luck and have fun!
